original_title: Fraudulently Registered Jeep Seized By Authorities
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);An illegally imported jeep, registered with the Department of Motor Traffic using false information, has been recovered.The Central Crime Investigation Division conducted a raid, leading to the seizure. A statement has been recorded from the suspect regarding the incident.Police confirmed that the jeep has been handed over to the local police, and around 20 other similar vehicles have been identified. Investigations are ongoing to bring them into police custody.
